situation.title: Frequently asked questions to the Ministry of Health
situation.meta_description: Summary of FAQs of atypical situations during registration for vaccination, with which citizens turn to the Ministry of Health

content.processed:
Can the system register birth numbers with 3 digits after the slash?

Yes. Many people from 80+ group have only 3 digits after the slash. 

Is it possible to register more people on one telephone number? 

Yes, unique identifier is health insurance number/birth number.  

I accidentally deleted PIN2. What should I do? 

From next week (3rd week of the year) it will be possible to call Line 1221, where with your assistance, the operator will be able to view your PIN2. This is provided in case when you have booked yourself or that someone close to you has helped you with the reservation. If you ordered via Line 1221, the system will not allow the PIN2 display again and a new registration must be created.

From 22. January onwards you will recieve PIN2 immediately after the registration only if there are empty slots available. If not, you will not recieve PIN2, but will recieve "an invitation SMS". This will notify you that slot is now available. With the information in the SMS you make the order for reseravation at reservatic.com/ockovani  

If you had registered before 22. January (you already have PIN2), you will not need to check the availability of vaccination slots. You will also recieve "an invitaion SMS" that you can make the order for reservation at reservatic.com/ockovani.

I accidentally deleted PIN1. What should I do? 

Make new reservation.

Will everyone who wants get vaccinated?

Yes. Czech Republic ordered sufficient amount of vaccines for all its citizens. Currently, the vaccines for 5,5 milions citizens are bindingly ordered, with possibility of order vaccines for another 10,6 milions citizens. Czech Republic therefore have enough vaccines for everyone.

How much the vaccination will cost? 

Vaccination against Covid-19 will be voluntarily and cost free. 

Can I change where I get a second dose of the vaccine?

There is the right to choose a provider and also the place of vaccination for the application of the vaccine in general. The place therefore remains the same for both doses.

 

Slots are occupied and the reservation cannot be made. What should I do? 

The capacity of each vacciantion sites are being updated every 24 hours. If you have PIN2 and site of your preference has not empty slots, we reccommend you to check the availability next day. 

Original PIN2 remains valid, for the purposes of reservation you do not need to create another registration and you can register directly at the reservatic.com/ockovani. 

From 22. January onwards you will recieve PIN2 immediately after the registration only if there are empty slots available. If not, you will not recieve PIN2, but will recieve "an invitation SMS". This will notify you that slot is now available. With the information in the SMS you make the order for reseravation at reservatic.com/ockovani  

If you had registered before 22. January (you already have PIN2), you will not need to check the availability of vaccination slots. You will also recieve "an invitaion SMS" that you can make the order for reservation at reservatic.com/ockovani.

If I do not receive the PIN2 immediately after registration, should I wait or register again?

For registration at Phase 1A - 80+, you recieve PIN2 immediately after registration, if it does not come immediately, nothing happens, you have to wait, it is only a system overload

From 22. January onwards you will recieve PIN2 immediately after the registration only if there are empty slots available. If not, you will not recieve PIN2, but will recieve "an invitation SMS". This will notify you that slot is now available. With the information in the SMS you make the order for reseravation at reservatic.com/ockovani  

If you had registered before 22. January (you already have PIN2), you will not need to check the availability of vaccination slots. You will also recieve "an invitaion SMS" that you can make the order for reservation at reservatic.com/ockovani.

If you have more PIN2?  

It does not matter which one you will use. All are valid and has unlimited validity. After usage of one PIN the other will immediately be invalidated

 

When I have more PIN for registration / reservation does it mean that I will take someone's place?

The amount of PIN recieved has not effect on the amount of empty slots in reservation system. 

If there is no empty slots for reservation, what should I do? 

Reservations are released gradually according to the vaccines availability. Do not worry, you will not lose your place, after registration you are registered in the system and then you will have book an empty slot, wait for a free date.

If I have a vaccination registration via line 1221, can I make the reservation myself or do I have to register again via line 1221?

If you register for vaccination via line 1221 and then you want to make a reservation for vaccination by yourself, this is possible using PIN2, which you recieved after registration of your health insurancy number and therefore there is no need to make a reservation again via line 1212.

From 22. January onwards you will recieve PIN2 immediately after the registration only if there are empty slots available. If not, you will not recieve PIN2, but will recieve "an invitation SMS". This will notify you that slot is now available. With the information in the SMS you make the order for reseravation at reservatic.com/ockovani  

If you had registered before 22. January (you already have PIN2), you will not need to check the availability of vaccination slots. You will also recieve "an invitaion SMS" that you can make the order for reservation at reservatic.com/ockovani.

I don't see a health questionnaire during the registration, is it okay?

Yes in phase 1A, that you are part of no health questionnaire are not required. The questionnaire are designated to people that belongs to phase 1B and phase 2. 

 

If I cancel the second reservation date, will the first one be canceled too?

  No, if the client cancels the second reservation date, the first one remains. However, if you cancel the first one, the second is canceled automatically. If you accidentally cancel the second reservation date, please, contact the vaccination site that makes the reservation again.  

If I do not make a reservation right away, because there are no free dates, will I then receive an appointment in the form of an SMS?

 At this point an SMS with empty slots are not being delivered. You have to continously checking the availability of empty slots at the reservation portal reservatic.cz  

From 22. January onwards you will recieve PIN2 immediately after the registration only if there are empty slots available. If not, you will not recieve PIN2, but will recieve "an invitation SMS". This will notify you that slot is now available. With the information in the SMS you make the order for reseravation at reservatic.com/ockovani  

If you had registered before 22. January (you already have PIN2), you will not need to check the availability of vaccination slots. You will also recieve "an invitaion SMS" that you can make the order for reservation at reservatic.com/ockovani.

That means that from 22. January onwards you will only receive an SMS with the information regarding availability of empty spots, no matter if you registered before or after 22. January 
 

Can I edit my personal details during the reservation?

In the reservation form is possible to edit pre-filled personal data. It is not possible to edit only the health insurance number (birth number in case of Czech citizens).

I am registered, however, the capacities for booking the date are full. How do I find out if a date is available?

Check free capacity at: reservatic.com/ockovani. Reservations are released gradually according to the vaccines availability. Do not worry, you will not lose your place, after registration you are registered in the system and then you will have book an empty slot, wait for a free date.

From 22. January you will recieve "an invitation SMS" once the empty slots will be available. 

Registration (citizen 80+) was successful, including the choice of vaccination site and the PIN2 (the date was no longer available). At this point, I found out that I made a mistake in my birth number during registration. So I made a new registration with the correct birth number to the same vaccination site (I have a new PIN2). Does the system recognize the discrepancy of birth name vs name automatically? Should I report such case somewhere?

At this point you only need to make a reservation for an empty slot with your new registration. The old one remain "unused". The system will recognize that as a discrepancy 

 

Does a vaccinated citizen (7 days after the 2nd dose of vaccine) have to adhere to quarantine if he/she has been in contact with infected covid-19?

At this point there are not yet sufficient data on the (non) infectivity of vaccinated persons, therefore it is still necessary to adhere to quarantine. Even if the disease does not break out due to vaccination, you could spread the virus.
